/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional blue and red accents that add a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the expansive backdrop. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and motorcycles dotting the road, weaving their way through the urban landscape. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
